text: Yad Saymon Pita, Jisas Klays bɨ wog gɨñeb ne mɨdɨl, bɨ takaw nop dad ameb ak mɨdebin. Mɨñɨl yad mɨj anɨb ak ñu kɨl tɨkebin. Tɨkɨl, nɨbi Klays nop gos lɨnepɨm okok nɨbop ñebin. Jisas Klays, ne God chɨn ak mɨdɨl, bɨ kasɨn gep chɨn ak mɨdeb. Ne yɨpɨd gɨl gɨtep gup. Chɨn nop kɨles gɨl gos lɨnopun tek, nɨbi abe nop kɨles gɨl gos lɨnepɨm.
